name: Stardust - Global Game Jam 2021
description:
Created in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2021, theme 'Lost and Found'.
The universe has gone dark. Find and rescue your lost star friends before the black hole swallows up the galaxy, and watch out for the asteroids! Deliver the stars back to the galaxy and restore light to the universe!

-Credits-
Game Designer/Project Manager: Panikos Theodosiou (@panikos.th - Instagram)
Programmer/Technical Design: Madison Tobal (@madz_br - instagram)
Music/SFX: Kirk Tiller (@kirktillermusic - instagram/twitter)
Art: Eva Pelko (@pelko.art - instagram)
Art: Amber Roy (@ fwoopi -instagram/twitter)
